discourse_list.title: Lightning Talk: Ethereum Status Codes ERC 1066

content.content: Brooke’s (@expede) presentation on Ethereum Status Codes:   drive.google.com    ETH Berlin Council — ESC.pdf Google Drive file.      See the discussion thread ERC-1066: Ethereum Status Codes (ESC) Video of the presentation:    view.ly    Lightning Talk: Ethereum Status Codes ERC-1066, Brooke Zelenka - FEM Council... Brooke Zelenka presents her code for implementing status codes as returns & messaging for smart contracts. Discussion thread and PDF link: https://ethereum-magicians.org/t/lightning-talk-ethereum-status-codes-erc-1066/770 Thanks to Santiment...
Wooooo! This is an awesome idea!

1066 is great! Especially like the fact it makes things translatable - this will be big improvement for UX in the future. We will have the same problem with signed data standards. Will add 1066 to the EIPs in the wallet ring. Thanks for the lighting talk and putting effort into making an EIP!
